title: Student Achievement
description: Big congratulations to Mahmuda Sultana Mimi for being selected as a 2025 Eno Fellow — a prestigious national honor awarded to the top MS/PhD students in transportation across the U.S.! Mimi’s passion, leadership, and dedication to shaping the future of transportation have earned her a spot among an elite cohort of future leaders.
